name: knex-supermodel
description: A thin Knex wrapper that provides a small base model that can be extended and act like a lite ORM.

scripts.ci:coveralls: docker-compose run -e COVERALLS_REPO_TOKEN=$COVERALLS_REPO_TOKEN app npm run coveralls
scripts.dc:test: docker-compose run app npm run test
scripts.dc:test:coverage: docker-compose run app npm run test:coverage
scripts.dc:test:create-db: docker-compose run app npm run test:create-db
scripts.dc:test:migrate: docker-compose run app npm run test:migrate
scripts.dc:test:setup: npm run dc:test:create-db; npm run dc:test:migrate
scripts.test:setup: npm run test:create-db; npm run test:migrate

author: Mathew Gardner <mathewdgardner@gmail.com>
